uploadwizard-desc: "Upload Wizard", tuntuna-zɔtɔ lɔkɔ bo " uploading multimedia "
right-mass-upload: "Batch-upload" faala zo'e zo'e n boi buyima la "upload Wizard"
action-mass-upload: "Batch-upload" faala zo'e zo'e n boi buyima la "upload Wizard"
api-error-parsererror: "Server" la lebese mɛ la 'JSON' gɔŋɔ n ka boi dee lebese. Dina wan dɛna daaŋɔ la API, bii fu ta'am tara "proxy" tuntuna la n gu'uri fu ze'ele faali duma "uploading" la tuna.
api-error-noimageinfo: "Upload" la nyaŋɛ ya, gee tuntuna la ka bo ni tu lasebaarɛ yɛsera faali la.
mwe-upwiz-unavailable: Fu "browser la ka de " compatible " la "upload Wizard" bii tari la "JavaScript" n kiŋe, bala la tu pa'ali fu la naana "upload" aŋa. ([https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/UploadWizard#Compatibility View compatibility requirements].)
mwe-upwiz-extension-disabled: pɛgera wa tibegɛ mɛ yɛsera la tiŋasuka "technical yele la zuo. Saŋa ka pa'asɛ ti fu dikɛ fumiŋa lɔgerɔ gɔŋɔ la mɛ.
mwe-upwiz-campaign-name-duplicate: "Campaign" n tari yudina wa pugum diŋɛ bɔna mɛ.
mwe-upwiz-campaign-unknown-error: Tuure ti tu ka mina n iŋɛ ni.
mwe-upwiz-api-warning-exists: [$1 another file] n pugum bɔna bini n boi wiki la faali yukuna nuu
mwe-upwiz-api-warning-was-deleted: Faali n tari yudina wa nuu boi bini mɛ "$1", amaa ka yese ni basɛ mɛ gee kan le ta'am " reupload" faali la. Fu faali la san bɔna di to'ore, tiregɛ malum gulesɛ ka yu'urɛ la
mwe-upwiz-tutorial-error-localized-file-: Gaafara, tumam ka nyɛ zamesegɔ fum yetɔgum puan. $1 la ayima n ka mi.
mwe-upwiz-tutorial-error-file-missing: Gaafara, tu ka nyɛ ni lɔgerɔ sɔsega la n nari ti tu kiŋɛ kalam. N beleni fu mɛ kɔ'ɔm sɔsɛ seke nɛŋa duma la puan.
mwe-upwiz-tutorial-error-cannot-transfor: Gaafara, tu ka nyaŋɛ ni nyɛ sɔsega la iŋɛ de'eŋo la ti tu kɔ'ɔm dikɛ la na'arɛ gɔŋɔ wa. Dina ta'am dɛna la daaŋɔ la Wikimedia commons, le tiregɛ pooren.
mwe-upwiz-add-file-0-free: Loe media faala ti ba wan tɔrɛ
mwe-upwiz-select-flickr: "Upload" foosi'a ti ba daa loose la
mwe-upwiz-flickr-disclaimer1: "Form" dina wa wan dikɛ la 'flickr.com' dikɛ basɛ la 'Flickr' puan. [https://www.flickr.com/help/terms/ terms of use] and [https://www.flickr.com/help/privacy-policy/ privacy policy].
mwe-upwiz-flickr-disclaimer2: N beleni fu mɛ baŋɛ ti fu san dikɛ lɔkɔ wa, fu IP aderesi la fu sokere puan la wan bɔna  la "Flickr".
mwe-upwiz-error-no-image-retrieved: Tu ka nyaŋɛ ni dikɛ faali la ze'ele $1.
mwe-upwiz-multi-file-select2: Loe sɛla ti fu wan bɔta ti fu yɔsegɛ la. Gurɛ Shift saafi la tiŋa gee dɔkɛ ti fu dikɛ fu lɔgerɔ zo'e zo'e loe. Fu ta'am loe paɛ $1 {{PLURAL:$1|file|files}} ti fu "upload"
mwe-upwiz-getting-metadata: Nyɛta faala lasebaarɛ la n boi ni bini....
mwe-upwiz-override-upload: "Upload" faali kuna wa la se'em me.
mwe-upwiz-remove-upload: Yese faali kuna ze'ele faali yusi'a to fu wan "upload" la
mwe-upwiz-file-retry: Le tiregɔ "uploads" si'a n koŋe la
mwe-upwiz-file-all-failed: "Uploads" la se'em sa'am ka iŋɛ ni suŋa.
mwe-upwiz-deeds-macro-prompt-text: Tu soke lasebaarɛ wa ti ubaŋɛ suŋa suŋa ti basɛ ti nɛra woo basɛ ti a dikɛ fumiŋa tɔgɛ yɛsera 'commons' lɔgerɔ la mɛ.
mwe-upwiz-source-ownwork-label: {{PLURAL:$1|This is|These are}} my own work and anyone is free to use {{PLURAL:$1|it|them}}.
mwe-upwiz-source-ownwork-description:
Magesɛ wuu: {{PLURAL:$1|photo|photos}}
Yelezure la puan, gɔmena n boi bini, tuunɛ ti fu iŋɛ la dɛ fumiŋa, la asi'a.

mwe-upwiz-source-ownwork-cc-by-4.0-expla: (Eeri la nɛra n wan tum {{PLURAL:$1|this media|these media}} dikɛ yɔɔrɔ bo suŋa)
mwe-upwiz-source-ownwork-cc-by-3.0-expla: (Eeri la nɛra n wan tum {{PLURAL:$1|this media|these media}} dikɛ yɔɔrɔ bo suŋa)
mwe-upwiz-source-ownwork-cc-zero-explain: (Basɛ yɔ'ɔ za'a, nɛra woo boi ti a wan dikɛ a tum {{PLURAL:$1|this work|these works}} la se'em me)
mwe-upwiz-source-ownwork-generic-explain: ({{PLURAL:$1|this work is|these works are}} sakɛ to'e fu lɔgerɔ la pa'asɛ wiki wa)
mwe-upwiz-source-ownwork-question: Beni "license ti {{GENDER:$2|you}} bɔta ti fu niɛ peelemi {{PLURAL:$1|this work|these works}} puan? Media' duma za'a boi 'commons' nari ti ba dikɛ pɔsɛ la zaŋa license puan.
mwe-upwiz-source-ownwork-purpose-label: N beleni fu mɛ loe sɛla n pa'ali vuurɛ la {{PLURAL:$1|this work|these works}}.
mwe-upwiz-source-ownwork-purpose-option-: {{PLURAL:$1|This work provides|These works provide}} Mi'ilum, ka'aŋɔ, bii lasebaarɛ bo nɛreba.
{{PLURAL:$1|This work is|These works are}} tara tuna mam miŋa magesɛ wuu mam miŋa fɔɔra, mam yiduma bii mam zɔduma bii mam nari ti n dikɛ bo mam tuuma la.

da "upload" {{PLURAL:$1|this file|these files}}! Wikimedia Commons ka basɛ ti fu dikɛ sɛla n de sɛla n de sɛba n boi zi'an la. N beleni fu mɛ le bisɛ [[Commons:What_Commons_is_not|this simple guide]].

Fu san bɔna fu puti'irɛ puan, n beleni fu mɛ, [[COM:L|learn more about licensing]], bii zaam zaam soke basɛba ti ba dikɛ sɛba n ta'am bɔna la ka'aŋɔ gee nyaŋɛ yese. Nɛreba puurɛ wan pee ti ba suŋɛ fu n boi [[Commons:Village_pump/Copyright|Wikimedia Commons's Village Pump]]. N pu'usɛ ya.
mwe-upwiz-source-ownwork-origin-option-o: {{PLURAL:$1|This work contains|These works contain}} basɛba tuuma

Magesɛ wuu: Nɛra ayima tuunɛ la san nyɛti {{PLURAL:$1|work|works}} 
 {{GENDER:$2|you}} sakeri mɛ bii san pugum {{GENDER:$2|you}} dikɛ nɛra tuunɛ lagum la {{GENDER:$2|your}} miŋa.
{{PLURAL:$1|Is|Are}} la pugum bɔna la  {{PLURAL:$1|work|works}} zaŋa ti fu dikɛ fu dikɛ tɔrɛ?
Ɛɛ, la pugum bɔna {{PLURAL:$1|work was|works were}} niɛ peelemi n boi bana wa puan [[COM:L#Well-known_licenses|free licenses]]
Ɛɛ, la pugum bɔna mɛ {{PLURAL:$1|work is|works are}} La ka gu n boi yɔ'ɔ wara sɛka.

Da "upload" {{PLURAL:$1|this file|these files}}! Wikimedia Commons ka tari sɛla n boi sɔɔreŋɔ la puan. "Media" sɛka ma'a [[COM:L#Acceptable_licenses|free licenses]] bii n boi [[COM:PD|public domain]] Ba sakɛ 'comons' puan mɛ.

Da "upload" {{PLURAL:$1|this file|these files}}! fu sa bu'ura mɛ, n beleni fu mɛ [[COM:L|learn more about licensing]] bii zaam zaam soke basɛba ti ba dikɛ ka'am dee nyaa dikɛ lɔgerɔ ka'am. Nɛreba wan pee la ba suŋɛ fu mɛ n boi [[COM:VPC|Wikimedia Commons's Village Pump]]. N pu'usɛ ya.
mwe-upwiz-source-ownwork-origin-option-a: Dikɛ AI engine la yu'urɛ pa'asɛ. Nɛra woo san kɔ'ɔm dɛna ni yia tuunɛ la {{PLURAL:$1|this work|these works}} yi ba za'a suŋa suŋa.
Magesɛ wuu:sɔna: "Mid journey AI"; fooŋmata n de Ansel Adams; sɔbera la Colorne AI, la basɛba.
mwe-upwiz-source-permission: Ba gɔngulesa la n bo fu yɔ'ɔ sɛla n wan iŋɛ suŋa ti fu yɔsegɛ ba.
mwe-upwiz-source-thirdparty-label: {{PLURAL:$1|This is|These are}} someone la se'em tuunɛ {{PLURAL:$1|is|are}} zaŋa ti fu tɔrɛ.
mwe-upwiz-source-thirdparty-description: Magesɛ vwuu: {{PLURAL:$1|photo/screenshot|photos/screenshots}} Fu nyɛ la 'internet' bii zi'an kayima, tuuma ti nɛra n maalɛ, la basɛba.
mwe-upwiz-source-thirdparty-intro: N beleni fu mɛ pa'alɛ adɛresi la ti fu nyɛ faali woo zi'an.
mwe-upwiz-source-thirdparty-custom-multi: Faile duma za'a san tari zɛvuurɔ, gulesa la yɛm dɛŋa diyina, fu ta'am kɛ ba la buyila ma'a bɔ'ɔra ba za'a.
mwe-upwiz-source-thirdparty-explain: Fu ta'am dikɛ nɛra ayima tuunɛ yɛsera fu sansɛka ti di pɔseri la zaŋa license la puan bii a yɔɔrɛ yɔ'ɔ la ba'asɛ ya
mwe-upwiz-source-thirdparty-cases: Nananewa yele tu sɛla zuo ti fu tari yɔ'ɔ ti fu niɛ peelemi {{PLURAL:$1|this work|these works}}:
mwe-upwiz-source-thirdparty-cases-text:
Fum mi sɛla [https
://creativecommons.org/share-your-work/cclicenses/ Creative Commons license] {{PLURAL:$1|this work was|these works were}} niɛ peelemi kalam?
mwe-upwiz-source-thirdparty-compliance-l: N beleni mɛ sakɛ ya yelesum la n boi zuo gee nyaa nyaŋɛ kiŋɛ.
mwe-upwiz-source-thirdparty-compliance-o: Mam sake ya {{PLURAL:$1|this work does|these works do}} lɔgerɔ n ka pa'asɛ gãresɛ mɛ la yɔɔrɛ yɛm nɛreba n ani se'em la lɔgo, posters, album covers, la basɛba.
mwe-upwiz-patent-dialog-text-warranty: Mam nari ti n dikɛ sɛla woo tum {{PLURAL:$1|this file|these files}} la lɔgerɔ woo ti ba dikɛ pa'alɛ {{PLURAL:$1|the file|the files}} Fu kan ta'am mina bii fu kan ta'am ŋmɛ patesi zi'an woo.
mwe-upwiz-patent-dialog-text-license: Mam iŋɛ la sɛla n boi zuon la. {{PLURAL:$1|design|designs}} 3D la puan {{PLURAL:$1|object|objects}} ŋmɛregɛ pa'alɛ
mwe-upwiz-patent-dialog-text-license-gra: Mam boi la daaŋɔ license bɔ'ɔra nɛra woo ti ba dikɛ tɔgera la. {{PLURAL:$1|file|files}} la sɛla n sɔi 3D lɔgerɔ.
mwe-upwiz-patent-weapon-policy: Nɛreba nari ti basɛ ti ba lebese ti ba lɔgerɔ yɛsera 'D' models' sɛka ti tu wan ta'am bisɛ ti tu dɛna zaberɛ bii 'defest' gɔŋɔ la. "Commons" tiŋa ta'am yese lɔgekuna n wan ta'am iŋɛ di ma'a suŋa suŋa.
mwe-upwiz-license-metadata-title: License ti baDina tari pa'asɛ gɔŋɔ gɔŋɔ la,( dagi faali la tari yɔɔrɔ sɛla ma'a)
mwe-upwiz-license-metadata-statements-ti: License bɔ'ɔra gee kɔ'ɔm dikɛ 'data' duma la za'a (dagi faali la)
mwe-upwiz-license-metadata-content:
Fu san kɔ'ɔm di'e la 'niɛ peelemi', fu sakɛ bo la [[wmf:Terms_of_Use|terms of use]],gee fu ka sakɛ ti fu basɛ fu bo'olum la tiŋa puan  [https
://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/ Creative Commons CC0 License].
mwe-upwiz-copy-statements-dialog: Data-data kɔ'ɔm boi lɔgerɔ tuna puan ti ba wan dikɛ doose lɔgerɔ sɔsega wa puan sɛka n boi sɔsega wa puan. fu mi suŋa suŋa?
mwe-upwiz-copy-statements-button: Magesɛ sɔsega wa'am faala la za'a....
mwe-upwiz-caption-add: {{PLURAL:$1|0=Add a caption|Add a caption in another language}}
mwe-upwiz-desc-add: {{PLURAL:$1|0=Add a description|Add a description in another language}}
mwe-upwiz-objref-pick-image: Dikɛ lɔkɔ la viisegɔ lɔgerɔ la pa'asɛ foote wa puan pa'asɛ.
mwe-upwiz-objref-notice-existing-image: Foote n pugum bɔna bɔ'ɔra sɛla n yele se'em la.
mwe-upwiz-objref-notice-update-delay: Ta'am dikɛ fu sansɛka pa'asɛ pɛgera la pa'asɛ pɛgera la.
mwe-upwiz-author-text: Dikɛ gɔngulesa la yu'urɛ pa'asɛ {{PLURAL:$1|this work|these works}}.
mwe-upwiz-author-unknown: Mam ka mi gɔngulesa la n de mina.
mwe-upwiz-author-text-ai: Dikɛ AI engine' la yu'urɛ pa'asɛ, doose la nɛresɛka n iŋɛ la puti'irɛ la yu'urɛ
mwe-upwiz-author-text-ai-help: Magesɛ wuu: gɔngulesa: "Midjourney AI; yele la Jane Doe
mwe-upwiz-autoconverted: Ba data lebege faalk wa mɛ yɛsera $1 aŋa la.
mwe-upwiz-source-text: Bɛsa ti fum nyɛ {{PLURAL:$1|this work|these works}}? Dikɛ sɔsega 'website' la, gɔŋɔ la bii zi'an kayima.
mwe-upwiz-source-ai: {{PLURAL:$1|This work is|These works are}} "AI" sa'asɛ ya
mwe-upwiz-thanks-wikitext: Ti fu dikɛ faali la n boi wiki puan tum, Tagesɛ gulesegɔbwa kiŋɛ pɛgerɛ la puan:
mwe-upwiz-thanks-update-delay: Fu san dikɛ foote la pa'asɛ pɛgera yu'ura la puan  fu ta'am dikɛ mita anuu pa'asɛ.
mwe-upwiz-thanks-url: Fu ta'am tɔkɛ ka n boi HTML, Tagesɛ URL kuna:
mwe-upwiz-upload-error-bad-filename-exte: Wiki wa ka to'e fu faali yu'ura n ba'asɛ gɔŋɔ la puan".$1".
mwe-upwiz-upload-error-bad-filename-no-e: Wiki wa eeri la faali duma tari pa'asegɔ la wuu ".JPG" ba'asegɔ la puan.
mwe-upwiz-upload-error-duplicate-filenam: Fu pugum diŋɛ "uploading" faala la mɛ "$1".
mwe-upwiz-allowed-filename-extensions: Ba n basɛ pa'asegɔ de la:
mwe-upwiz-upload-error-duplicate: Ba yuum dikɛ faali wa pa'asɛ wiki wa puan mɛ.
mwe-upwiz-upload-error-duplicate-archive: Ba yuum dikɛ fu'uŋɔ wa pa'asɛ wiki wa puan mɛ, gee ta yese pooren.
mwe-upwiz-deleted-duplicate-unknown-file: Faali yu'urɛ ti tu ka mina
mwe-upwiz-fileexists-replace-on-page: Faali la yudina pugum bɔna mɛ. Fu san bɔta ti fu tee e, kiŋɛ pɛgerɛ la puan ta [$2 $1]  gee tee e bilam.
mwe-upwiz-fileexists-replace-no-link: N beleni fu mɛ loe pɔsega la yima, sɛla n pɔsega dina wa pugum dikɛ tuna mɛ n boi faali ayima.
mwe-upwiz-blacklisted-details: N beleni fu mɛ loe to'ore, pa'alegɔ pɔsega ([$2 more info]).
mwe-upwiz-blacklisted-details-feedback: N beleni fu mɛ loe pa'alegɔ pɔsega di to'ore ([$2 more info]). • [$3 Send feedback]
mwe-upwiz-publish-metadata: Niɛ data peelemi bo faala la za'a
mwe-upwiz-publish-metadata-error: N beleni fu mɛ maalɛ tuure duma za'a
mwe-upwiz-metadata-help-content: Nananewa ti Fu faali tara "uploaded", fu san  pa'asera " metadata" ba puan wan suŋɛ basɛ ti ba nyaŋɛ baŋɛ nɛreba ba'asɛ.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-skiptutorial: Fu ta'am le nyaŋɛ zamesɛ zamesegɔ wa pa'asɛ n boi [$1 your user preferences], puan $2 → $3.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-author: Nɛresɛka n dikɛ fɔɔra la la yu'urɛ bii pente foote la, ŋmɛ bɔmbɔresi la, la basɛba.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-thirdparty-license: (Fu ta'am nyɛ lasebaarɛ wa n boi pɛgera la zuo ti fu nyɛ zi'an la {{PLURAL:$1|this work|these works}}.)
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-source: Zi'an ti ba dikɛ tari sɔsega wa ze'ele na, ta'am dɛna 'URL' bii gɔŋɔ bii gɔŋɔ.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-sign: Fu ta'am dikɛ fu wiki userɛ la yu'urɛ bii fu yu'urɛ. Bayi daayinɛ puan, dina wan lebege la fu wiki tuntuna la pɛgerɛ.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-title: Maalɛ yelepa'alemiŋerɛ gɔŋɔ n wan ta'am pa'alɛ. Dikɛ fu yetɔgum tɔgum la dikɛ zi'an. Dikɛ fu lɔgerɔ la, san bɔna.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-caption: Dikɛ pa'asɛ gɔŋɔ diyima gɔŋɔ yɛsera sɔsega wa gɔŋɔ la pa'asɛ, yɛsera lasebaarɛ la n de nimmu'urɛ la ma'a.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-description: Pa'alɛ lasebaarɛ woo ti ba wan suŋɛ basɛba ti ba bɔkɛ yele wa n de sɛla.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-date: Loe dabeserɛ ti ba maalɛ tuunɛ wa bii ti ba pi'isɛ tuunɛ la yia.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-location: [$1 Geocode your file] baŋɛ sɔsega la n gulesɛ ni zi'an (la ni kɔ'ɔm ka tara suŋerɛ ti fu ki'isɛ zi'an bo miidiya buuri woo).
mwe-upwiz-file-need-file: N beleni fu mɛ pa'asɛ "upload" yia.
mwe-upwiz-deeds-need-deed: N beleni fu mɛ garesɛ fum n nyɛ faali wa zi'an la fu sanɛ wa n wan iŋɛ se'em, gee loe sɛla n wan iŋɛ se'em.
mwe-upwiz-license-show-recommended: Dikɛ "site" la n wan ka'am license la.
mwe-upwiz-error-signature-blank: Fu nari ti fu saŋɛ la fum n tari nyu'uŋɔ la bii fu yu'urɛ yu'urɛ yelemiŋerɛ la zuo.
mwe-upwiz-error-latitude: "Latitude" la nari ti la dɛna la kalɛ n boi '90' la 90.
mwe-upwiz-error-longitude: "Longitude" la nari ti la dɛna la kalɛ tiŋasuka 180 la 180.
mwe-upwiz-error-altitude: "Altitude" la nari ti la dɛna la kalɛ.
mwe-upwiz-error-heading: Pɔsega la nari ti la dɛna la kalɛ n de 0 la 360 tiŋasuka.
mwe-upwiz-error-signature-too-long: Fu saŋerɛ la ba'am wɔgɛ mɛ. Basɛ ti ka iŋɛ girega gaŋɛ $1 {{PLURAL:$1|character|characters}}.
mwe-upwiz-error-signature-too-short: Fu saŋerɛ la ba'am ana la gurega. Basɛ ti ka wɔgɛ gana $1 {{PLURAL:$1|character|characters}}.
mwe-upwiz-error-date-license-mismatch: "Data" la ti fu  daa loe ka makɛ la license la ($1).
mwe-upwiz-error-date-license-unlikely: "Data" la ti ba daa loe la daanse'ere ka dɛna ma'a, gee bɔ'ɔra license la ($1).
mwe-upwiz-error-too-long:
Ki'isegɔ la ba'am wɔgɛ mɛ.
N beleni fu mɛ suŋɛ suŋa suŋa ti yeledina wa de la $1{{PLURAL:$1|character|characters}}.
mwe-upwiz-error-too-short: Yeledina wa ba'am ana la girega. N beleni fu mɛ bisɛ suŋa suŋa suŋa ti yele wa de la $1 {{PLURAL:$1|character|characters}}.
mwe-upwiz-error-title-too-long: Tile kuna wa ba'am wɔgɛ mɛ. N beleni fu mɛ bisɛ suŋa suŋa ti tile wa de la $1 {{PLURAL:$1|byte|bytes}}.
mwe-upwiz-error-title-too-short: N beleni fu mɛ tile dina wa ba'am ana la girega. N beleni fu mɛ bisɛ suŋa suŋa ti tile wa de la $1 {{PLURAL:$1|byte|bytes}}.
mwe-upwiz-error-bad-captions: Daaŋɔ boi la yɛla basɛba n boi gɔŋɔ la puan.
mwe-upwiz-error-bad-descriptions: Daaŋɔ boi la yɛla basɛba n boi pa'alegɔ la puan.
mwe-upwiz-error-title-blacklisted: Tile dina wa tari la gulesegɔ n ka tari vuurɛ. N beleni fu mɛ tee ka.
mwe-upwiz-error-title-senselessimagename: N beleni fu mɛ basɛ ti tile wa vuurɛ pa'asɛ.
mwe-upwiz-error-title-thumbnail: Dina ŋwɔni mɛ la "thumbnail" tile la. N beleni fu mɛ DA "upload" "thumbnail" pooren n boi wiki nuu puan.Sankana, n beleni fu mɛ maalɛ yu'urɛ n tari putĩ’ir la bala la vuurɛ n ba’am ana suŋa suŋa gee ka tari "thumbnail" duma gɔŋɔ la.
mwe-upwiz-error-title-extension: Fu ka nari ti fu pa'asɛ lɔgerɔ yɛ'ɛsa. Yen iŋɛ nɛra woo ka kãalɛ tiŋa la dee aŋa la wan bisɛ basɛ.
mwe-upwiz-error-title-protected: Tile kuna wa kɔ'ɔm dikɛ la gu'um pɛgera wiki wa zuo. N beleni fu mɛ loe ayima.
mwe-upwiz-error-title-duplicate: Ba daa pa'alɛ tiŋa wa mɛ gee ti fu wan yeti fu dikɛ fu lɔgerɔ la pa'asɛ lɔgerɔ ayima. Sɛla n boi sɔsega la ti ba tara de la ko'om puan, ti ba dikɛ la faile yelesum pa'asɛ se'em pa'asɛ.
mwe-upwiz-error-license-wikitext-too-sho: Wikitext' la kalam ba'am ana la girega ti a dɛna license.
mwe-upwiz-error-license-wikitext-too-lon: Wikitext la ti fu ki'isɛ ni la wɔgɛ mɛ.
mwe-upwiz-error-license-wikitext-missing: Wikitext la ti fum kɛ'ɛra la ka tari license pa'alɛ ti ba wan iŋɛ.
mwe-upwiz-error-patent-disagree: Fu nari ti fu sakɛ bo yelesum la.
mwe-upwiz-error-pageprops-missing-page: Fu ka nyaŋɛ to'e pɛgera sɛla la. pɛgera ka bɔna.
mwe-upwiz-error-pageprops-missing-prop: Fu ka nyaŋɛ to'e pɛgera sɛla la: lɔgerɔ (nan) ka boi.
mwe-upwiz-error-submit-captions: Foote la boi ni la suŋa suŋa, dee sɛla n daa ka ani suŋa suŋa ti ba dikɛ suŋɛ {{PLURAL:$1|caption|captions}}.
mwe-upwiz-error-submit-captions-remedy: Ti fu ki'isɛ Dina: nyɛ [[$1]] pa'asɛ gɔŋɔ la bilam.
mwe-upwiz-warning-postdate: Dabeserɛ la ti fu loe la boi la beere puan.
mwe-upwiz-details-error-count: Bilam {{PLURAL:$1|is one error|are $1 errors}} la {{PLURAL:$2|form|forms}} saazuo. Demese {{PLURAL:$1|error|errors}},gee tiregɛ le pa'asɛ.
mwe-upwiz-details-warning-count: Bilam {{PLURAL:$1|is one warning|are $1 warnings}} la {{PLURAL:$2|form|forms}} saazuo.  Tumam ka'am ti tu demese mɛ {{PLURAL:$1|it|them}} gee nyaa ta'am tɔkɛ ni.
mwe-upwiz-too-many-files-text: Fu ta'am wan "upload" mɛ ma'a $1 {{PLURAL:$1|file|files}} buyima amaa fu ta'am tiregɛ ti fu "upload" $2 {{PLURAL:$2|file|files}} ba za'a. N beleni fu mɛ le tiregɛ la faala fii!
mwe-upwiz-file-too-large-text: Fu wan ta'am "upload" faala n zo'e paɛ $1 ma'a. Fum tiregɛ "upload" faali n de $2.
mwe-upwiz-dialog-warning: Tumam yeti fu pirɛ samanɛ la za'a suŋa suŋa. Fu boti fu kelum bɔna dee ka tee ka'aŋɔ wa?
mwe-upwiz-license-cc-by-sa-3.0-de-text: Creative Commons Attribution ShareAlike 3.0 Germany $3 [$2 (learn more)]

"-3.0-no-text/gur
Creative Commons Attribution ShareAlike 3.0 Norway $3 [$2 (learn more)]"
mwe-upwiz-license-custom-explain: Nari ti ka tara la yelemɛŋerɛ [$2 copyright tag]
mwe-upwiz-license-own-pd-text: Yɔ'ɔ za'a "waived" mɛ la "creative Commons" zaŋa "license" (like public domain) $3
mwe-upwiz-license-pd-old-100: Gulesera la ki gaŋɛ 100 yuuma n tole la.
mwe-upwiz-license-pd-old: Gulesera la ki gaŋɛ 70 yuuma n tole la.
mwe-upwiz-license-pd-art-70: Sɛla n sɔi ti nɛreba dikɛ pentiŋa sɛka n boi gɔmena la puan se'em la n sɔi la yuum pisiyi n tole la ([$2 learn more])
mwe-upwiz-license-pd-us-generic: Mam kaalɛ 'internet' la zi'an kayima ti {{PLURAL:$1|this is|these are}} 'U.S.' n boi nɛreba zo'e zo'e  puan
mwe-upwiz-license-pd-us: A yuum pɔsɛ biŋe gɔŋɔ la peelum la United States tiŋa puan dee ti 1929 yuunɛ tole.
mwe-upwiz-license-pd-usgov: Paalega {{PLURAL:$1|work|works}} U.S federal gɔmena la puan
mwe-upwiz-license-pd-usgov-military-navy: Paalega {{PLURAL:$1|work|works}} U.S soogɛpa la na'arɛ la puan
mwe-upwiz-license-pd-ineligible: La ba'am ana la naana mɛ ti tu tari yɔ'ɔ.
mwe-upwiz-license-pd-ineligible-help: Bisɛ fumiŋa bɔ'ɔra dina wa. Foote la nari ti a dɛna naana wuu dɛlemadɛtɔ kɛɛka bii mɔlega.
mwe-upwiz-license-pd-textlogo: Logo n tari naana gɔŋɔ ma'a (yelebire-mɔgerɛ)
mwe-upwiz-license-copyrighted-free-use: Ba yɔkɛ yɔ'ɔ mɛ dee ti tu ta'am dikɛ tuunɛ sɛla woo, yɛsera koosego zi'an
mwe-upwiz-license-attribution: Tu ta'am dikɛ tuunɛ sɛla woo gura, yɛsera koosego daana san ta'am dikɛ sɛla n de yɔɔrɛ yɛ'ɛsa la suŋa suŋa.
mwe-upwiz-license-yes-subhead: Loe "license" buuri buuri {{PLURAL:$1|this work is|these works are}} dikɛ niɛ puan
mwe-upwiz-license-no-head: Aayi, mam ka tari lasebaarɛ wa
mwe-upwiz-license-no-subhead:
Da "upload" {{PLURAL:$1|this file|these files}}!Wikimedia Commons ka "host" miidiya n boi yɔ'ɔ puan. Faali sɛba ma'a [$2 free licenses] bii [$3 public domain] Ba basɛ ti fɔɔra dɛna 'commons' puan. .

Fu san bɔna la buyi buyi puan, n beleni fu mɛ [$4 learn more about licensing] bii n beleni ya mɛ soke basɛba ti ba tari sɛba n ta'am bɔna la ka'aŋɔ gee ti nɛreba puurɛ wan pee la ba suŋɛ fu mɛ n boi [$5 Wikimedia Commons's Village Pump]. N pu'usɛ ya.
mwe-upwiz-license-cc0-head: {{PLURAL:$1|This work is|These works are}}"copyright" wara la ka gu ka gee {{PLURAL:$1|has|have}} "license ka boi za'an  $3 [$2 (learn more)]
mwe-upwiz-license-cc0-subhead: "Wikipedia Commons" boi la USA, bala la {{PLURAL:$1|work|works}} la nari ti tu bɔna yɔ'ɔ tiŋa la bala puan.Sɛla bɛɛ n boi leŋum la de la yelemiŋerɛ? Bisɛ sɛla za'a n de se'em la.
mwe-upwiz-license-other-head: Dikɛ license yima yima pa'asɛ wikitext format puan.
mwe-upwiz-license-cc-head: Sɛba n tari yɔ'ɔ yɔ'ɔ la pu'usɛ ya {{PLURAL:$1|this work|these works}} la 'Creative Commons' license n tari yelemiŋerɛ
mwe-upwiz-license-cc-subhead: Dagi creative commons license duma za'a ani suŋa bɔ'ɔra'site' wa. Baŋɛ suŋa ti mina n tari yɔ'ɔ sum ti a tara "license" kuna ayima.
mwe-upwiz-license-flickr-head: Sɛba n tari yɔ'ɔ yɔ'ɔ la pu'usɛ ba mɛ {{PLURAL:$1|photo or video|photos or videos}} n boi "Flickr" puan dikɛ la license n de yelemiŋerɛ.
mwe-upwiz-license-flickr-subhead: Bisɛ 'License' header' la n boi Flickr pɛgera la bɔba. Bayi la n de "icons" la license yu'urɛ ti ba daa ni kɔ'ɔm dɛna la sɛla n loe kalam la puan.
mwe-upwiz-license-public-domain-usa-head: "Copyright" la kɔ'ɔm daa tole mɛ n boi USA
mwe-upwiz-license-public-domain-usa-subh: {{SITENAME}} ku boi la USA, bala tuunɛ la nari ti tu bɔna yɔ'ɔ tiŋa la puan.
mwe-upwiz-license-usgov-head: {{PLURAL:$1|This work was|These works were}} United States gɔmena la iŋɛ ka
mwe-upwiz-license-misc: Yɛla tɔka n boi zi'an sɔsega
mwe-upwiz-license-custom-head: Puti'irɛ diyima ti ba ka yi saazuo la
mwe-upwiz-license-none-head: Mam nyɛ ni ka la " Internet "-mam ka ti'isɛ
mwe-upwiz-license-none: Mam sakɛ sira {{PLURAL:$1|this work is|these works are}} zaŋa "licensed" bii Gɔmena nɛreba n boi lɔgerɔ la puan. bɔkɛ ti mam san ka pa'asɛ sɛla n nari ti n yese lasebaarɛ la saŋa woo la {{PLURAL:$1|file|files}} ta'am ta yese ni.
mwe-upwiz-license-generic-head: {{PLURAL:$1|This work is|These works are}} sakɛ to'e fu lɔgerɔ pa'asɛ wiki wa puan.
mwe-upwiz-license-generic: Mam bisɛ ni [[{{int:disclaimerpage}}|the disclaimer for this wiki]] la mam mi'ilum suŋa {{PLURAL:$1|this work is|these works are}} dagi "Data" gu'a zi'an la  puan la gaŋɛ wiki wa puan.
mwe-upwiz-license-confirm-remove: Fu tari yara ti fu bɔta ti fu yese {{PLURAL:$1|this upload|these uploads}}?
mwe-upwiz-license-external:
Faali la boi la "license" la leŋum n boi zi'a la puan
"$1": $2.
mwe-upwiz-license-external-invalid: Faali la boi la license la puan n boi zi'an la puan "$1": $2. Zube'o la, wiki wa ka basɛ license la.
mwe-upwiz-license-photoset-invalid: Zube'o la, footoset' la puan ka tari license ti tu nara ti tu dikɛ tu dikɛ tu tum site wa zuo.
mwe-upwiz-license-pd-old-70-1923: A niɛ peelum wia daana dee 1929 yuunɛ la paɛ dee ti gɔngulesera la ka bɔna gaŋɛ yuuma 70 n tole la
mwe-upwiz-license-pd-old-70: Gulesera la ki mɛ gaŋɛ yuuma 70.
mwe-upwiz-url-invalid: 'URL' n dikɛ na'arɛ la ka suŋɛ bii yelesi'a n sɔi pumpɔremɔ bii gu'a $1 Foote boo "photoset" gee kan ta'am tum.
mwe-upwiz-user-blacklisted: Zu be'o, fɔɔra ka boi ze'ele dina $1 "account" wan ta'am "uploaded" n boi zɛkuna puan.
mwe-upwiz-categories-missing: Buuri la kayima ka tari pa'alegɔ pɛgerɛ. Fu tari yara ti fu ta'asɛ yu'urɛ la suŋa?
mwe-upwiz-thumbnail-failed: "Upload" la nyaŋɛ ya, gee "server" la kan nyaŋɛ nyɛ a ti a bisɛ "thumbnail".
mwe-upwiz-error-title-invalid: Tile dina wa dagi yelemɛŋerɛ. Bisɛ suŋa suŋa ti fu yese yɛla n ani wuu'square 'brackets', "colons", " slashes", "comparison operators", " pipes" la "curly brackets".
mwe-upwiz-feedback-blacklist-line-intro: Dina de la tile yu'ura ki'isegɔ n basɛ gee dɔla ka: $1
mwe-upwiz-errordialog-title: Fu pugum basɛ ni ti tu tue mɛ.
mwe-upwiz-error-nosuchcampaign: "Campaign ka boi ni n tari yu'urɛ wa " $1".
prefs-description-uploads: Dikɛ fu gɔngulesa la yu'urɛ la 'default license' la.
mwe-upwiz-prefs-def-license-def: Iŋɛ sɛla woo ti fu wan iŋɛ se'em.
mwe-upwiz-prefs-def-license-custom-help: Fu san loe sɛla za'a daana fu zuon ti ba dikɛ zi'an wa tum.
mwe-upwiz-prefs-license-name-help: De'eŋo ti ba dikɛ a yu'urɛ tɔgum pa'asɛ zi'an la san wee dɛna la voore
mwe-upwiz-prefs-skiptutorial: Basɛ gɔŋɔ la puti'irɛ "licensing" pa'alegɔ puti'irɛ.
mwe-upwiz-prefs-maxsimultaneous-upload: Kalɔ zo'e zo'e n boi "concurrent uploads"
mwe-upwiz-mv-cta-heading: Suŋɛ basɛ ti foote zo'e zo'e nyɛta bɔ'ɔra nɛra woo.
mwe-upwiz-mv-cta-description: "Commons" tari la [[c:Commons:Structured_data/Computer-aided_tagging|new tool]] la wan sɔsega ti tags boi fɔɔra ti fu yɔsegɛ fu san pugum ka pa'asɛ tag duma la. Fu san pugum sakɛ ti tag duma kinɛ, fu suŋeri mɛ basɛ ti foote dɛna naana bɔ nɛra woo ti a ɛ.
mwe-upwiz-mv-cta-checkbox-label: Ɛɛ, Mam wan bɔta ti n nyɛ lasebaarɛ gee ti mam lɔgerɔ la tari tags sɛla n maasum ti n ɛɛra n bisɛ.
mwe-upwiz-mv-cta-final-cta: Maasum ti fu pɔsɛ "tagging" yɔ'ɔ wɛ'ɛsa? [[c:Special:SuggestedTags|Give the tool a try]] la fu "tagging" foote ti nɛra woo mina nanana wa!
mwe-upwiz-mv-cta-user-preference-set:
Suŋa suŋa! Fu ta'am tee maasegɔ dina wa n boi fu sansɛka [[c:Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-echo|Preferences
]].
mwe-upwiz-mv-cta-user-preference-unset: Fu kan le to'e yelesi'a ti fu ta'asɛ fum n boi sɛla n boi fu "uploads".
mwe-upwiz-mv-cta-user-preference-set-fai: Tu ka nyaŋɛ ni suŋɛ fum n boti fu nɔgerɛ la saŋa kana. N beleni fu mɛ nyɛ fu[[c:Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-echo|Preferences]]  loe yelesum puan.
mwe-upwiz-metadata-notice-description: "EXIF metadata" n boi faali Dina puan ta'am tara zi'an bii miŋa "data automatically" pa'asɛ n boi fu "camera". [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Commons:Exif Learn more].org/wiki/Commons: Exif zamesɛ zo'e yɛsera ba n demeseri se'em bii yese " EXIF metadata ".
